title: Is healing useless?
body:
Do you feel that champion heals ( such as soraka's heal are getting quite useless on a support since they scale with ap.
Something that removes cc like quick silver but weaker would be nicer.

replies.body: You haven't seen a good soraka play then? She's the most annoying support to play against during teamfights. Keeping everyone alive with her spamming %hp heals.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8eVQOn5y,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-02T10:19:55.378+0000)
>
> You haven't seen a good soraka play then? She's the most annoying support to play against during teamfights. Keeping everyone alive with her spamming %hp heals.

I believe it was OddOne who said Kill the fking soraka

Soraka is kinda meh now, but heals aren't a bad thing and a lot of them are decently strong.

Removing CC by using an ability would kinda be broken on a support anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8eVQOn5y,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-02T08:17:42.938+0000)
>
> Soraka is kinda meh now, but heals aren't a bad thing and a lot of them are decently strong.
> 
> Removing CC by using an ability would kinda be broken on a support anyway.

{{champion:41}}

Ok let me rephrase, removing CC FROM ANOTHER PERSON using an ability would kinda be broken on a support anyway.

There's already mikael's and QSS, ADC's don't need more removals of CC from a champion.
AP Soraka support is good and throws out heals of like 400 every second and returns heaps of health on well-placed Starcalls.
